title: The Whole truth (1976)
creator_credit: Films Incorporated, Thomas Walsh and Michael Spewak
brief_description: A backstage look at the making of ‘To tell the truth’, one of television’s longest running and most consistently popular game shows, captures the incredible pace of producing not one but five shows in a day.
creator_credit_for_label: Films Incorporated, Thomas Walsh and Michael Spewak
description: A backstage look at the making of ‘To tell the truth’, one of television’s longest running and most consistently popular game shows, captures the incredible pace of producing not one but five shows in a day.
